医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能驱动的研究精确定位了塑造骨骼的基因德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校和纽约基因组中心的研究人员利用人工智能分析数以万计的 X 射线图像和基因序列，已经能够查明塑造我们骨骼的基因，从肩膀的宽度到腿的长度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/AI-powered-study-pinpoints-genes-that-shape-bones.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/AI-powered-study-pinpoints-genes-that-shape-bones.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77053810-5e03-47f2-b232-f83c0a4de804 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 15:42:42 -0400 AI-powered study pinpoints genes that shape bones
研究人员确定酶如何帮助预防化疗患者的心脏损伤伊利诺伊大学芝加哥分校的研究人员发现了一种酶可以帮助预防化疗患者心脏损伤的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Researchers-identify-how-enzymes-can-help-prevent-heart-damage-in-chemotherapy-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Researchers-identify-how-enzymes-can-help-prevent-heart-damage-in-chemotherapy-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07ed25e0-71e6-4579-9ec5-ad041767c429 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 15:40:14 -0400 Researchers identify how enzymes can help prevent heart damage in chemotherapy patients
新型超灵活神经植入物记录深部大脑区域的单个神经元活动根据一项新的研究，一种通过血管输送的新型超小型、超灵活的电子神经植入物可以记录大鼠大脑深处的单个神经元活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/New-ultra-flexible-neural-implant-records-single-neuron-activity-in-deep-brain-regions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/New-ultra-flexible-neural-implant-records-single-neuron-activity-in-deep-brain-regions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cc7cc8a-107f-4924-a961-9f4e107b7c7d Thu, 20 Jul 2023 15:34:13 -0400 New ultra-flexible neural implant records single-neuron activity in deep-brain regions
研究发现，免疫系统会产生特定基因来对抗常见细菌新的研究表明，免疫系统会产生特定的基因来对抗常见的细菌，例如食物中发现的细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Immune-systems-develop-specific-genes-to-fight-against-common-bacteria-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Immune-systems-develop-specific-genes-to-fight-against-common-bacteria-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17f4cd94-1580-4adf-b61f-6a6cf7820091 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 15:27:32 -0400 Immune systems develop specific genes to fight against common bacteria, study finds
研究人员开发新系统来确定家族性高胆固醇血症的新疗法《蒙娜丽莎》由意大利艺术家列奥纳多·达·芬奇创作，是世界上最知名的画作之一。但许多人会惊讶地发现这幅画提供了一种称为家族性高胆固醇血症（FH）的疾病的第一个证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Researchers-develop-novel-system-to-identify-new-therapeutics-for-familial-hypercholesterolemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Researchers-develop-novel-system-to-identify-new-therapeutics-for-familial-hypercholesterolemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75a77561-ffdc-41ad-b848-13ad8fed4fa1 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 15:13:02 -0400 Researchers develop novel system to identify new therapeutics for familial hypercholesterolemia
FDA批准的新型骨折固定系统2023 年 7 月 20 日宣布，美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA)、犹他大学骨科创新中心 (OIC)、骨科系和 Spencer Fox Eccles 医学院宣布，一种名为 Bone Bolt System 的新骨折固定系统已批准上市。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Novel-system-for-fixing-bone-fractures-approved-by-FDA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Novel-system-for-fixing-bone-fractures-approved-by-FDA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b85da95-61cb-4ceb-aa06-06bce4571a43 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 15:07:20 -0400 Novel system for fixing bone fractures approved by FDA
研究揭示了为什么肥胖会使卵巢癌更加致命大多数患有卵巢癌的女性被诊断出患有该疾病的最晚期形式。被诊断患有这种疾病的人中，只有不到三分之一能在五年后存活下来。根据最近的一项研究，作为第三种最常见的妇科癌症，仅 2020 年，全球就有超过 20 万人因此死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-Illuminates-why-obesity-makes-ovarian-cancer-more-deadly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-Illuminates-why-obesity-makes-ovarian-cancer-more-deadly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbc3c622-22e4-431a-ae10-493f73342240 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 15:04:15 -0400 Study illuminates why obesity makes ovarian cancer more deadly
宣布 2023 年任命六名新的 Damon Runyon 临床研究员达蒙·鲁尼恩癌症研究基金会任命了六名新的达蒙·鲁尼恩临床研究员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Six-new-Damon-Runyon-Clinical-Investigators-announced-for-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Six-new-Damon-Runyon-Clinical-Investigators-announced-for-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3eba434-8449-45c1-8ab4-bd96186545f2 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 14:59:43 -0400 Six new Damon Runyon Clinical Investigators announced for 2023
研究强调需要改进巴雷特食管的筛查和监测发表在《胃肠病学》上的一项新研究旨在提高巴雷特食管 (BE) 早期癌症检测的筛查和监测实践的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-highlights-need-for-improved-screening-and-surveillance-for-Barretts-esophagus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-highlights-need-for-improved-screening-and-surveillance-for-Barretts-esophagus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0ea7507-f326-47f0-8e0d-dd20b25cda87 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 14:56:00 -0400 Study highlights need to improve screening and surveillance for Barrett's esophagus
医疗保健领域的私募股权投资与患者和付款人的成本上升相关由芝加哥大学卫生政策研究员领导的一个研究小组发现，医疗保健领域日益常见的私募股权投资通常与患者和付款人的成本上升有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Private-equity-investments-in-healthcare-linked-with-higher-costs-to-病人-and-payers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Private-equity-investments-in-healthcare-linked-with-higher-costs-to-病人-and-payers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e21a8eda-eaf8-493c-adf4-71093ddb6293 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 14:49:52 -0400 Private equity investments in healthcare associated with higher costs to patients and payers
